mapper.select: select * from ( select a.date_ , a.code_ as code , a.name_ as name , max(a.pn) as pn , max(a.ratio_) as ratio , count(*) as cnt , max(a.key_) as keyCode from ( select key_, date_, code_, name_, ratio_, case when GPT_PN_ is not null then case when GPT_PN_ = 'P' then 'P' when GPT_PN_ = 'N' then 'N' else '' end else case when pn_ = 'P' then 'P' when pn_ = 'N' then 'N' else '' end end as pn from hdbown.prediction_pn ) a where 1 = 1 and a.pn = 'P' and a.date_ = to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') group by a.date_, a.code_, a.name_ order by a.date_ desc, ratio desc ) where rownum < = 10

select * from ( select a.date_ , a.code_ as code , substr(a.name_,1,1) || lpad('*',length(a.name_)-2,'*') || substr(a.name_, length(a.name_), 1) AS name, , max(a.pn) as pn , max(a.ratio_) as ratio , count(*) as cnt , max(a.key_) as keyCode from ( select key_, date_, code_, name_, ratio_, case when GPT_PN_ is not null then case when GPT_PN_ = 'P' then 'P' when GPT_PN_ = 'N' then 'N' else '' end else case when pn_ = 'P' then 'P' when pn_ = 'N' then 'N' else '' end end as pn from hdbown.prediction_pn ) a where 1 = 1 and a.pn = 'N' and a.date_ = to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') group by a.date_, a.code_, a.name_ order by a.date_ desc, ratio desc ) where rownum < = 10
